reviews.text: Stayed at the this hotel four years ago loved it, stayed this year again with a large group, the staff were very helpfull and very accomadating to all needs. Rooms were cleaned very well. Ideal hotel to stay at if you plan to visit all the historic attractions. Hotel is very clean, great breakfast.
reviews.title: Highly recomend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A special thanx to Ms Camille and Suat
reviews.title: Good Location

reviews.text: Good location and value. Grand Bazaar and Spice market within easy walk. The Cemberlitas Hamani (turkish bath) was about two blocks away. Transportation on the tram right outside the hotel. The restaurant has good food and great waiters. Breakfast included with the room was good start for the day. Staff were great.
reviews.title: Excellent service and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just came back from Istanbul after a 4 nights stay at the Faros Hotel. I must say that the staff and restaurant are way beyond excellent. They were extremely welcoming and helpful. We arrived early in the morning and were given an early check-in. Plus we booked via their website for more than 3 nights and were given airport transportation. In general, the room was small but very clean (need some remodelling especially the bathtub), breakfast was good, and overall the fantastic location and hospitable service and helpful staff are more than enough reasons to say that if I'm back in Istanbul again, I would definitely stay there and recommend friends and family to stay there also.
reviews.title: Glad we went there.

reviews.text: PS. U must dine at the restaurant!! The food is delicious (esp. Tasty kebab)!! Compliments to the chef!!!
reviews.title: hotel review
Ideal hotel to stay during marathon w/e
reviews.text: We were upgraded to a Suite and really enjoyed our stay. The staff is really friendly and the location of the hotel is fantastic. I ran the 15km during the Istanbul Marathon and the finish is just 2 min away. The hotel is really close to nice restaurants, grand bazaar, blue mosque and Hagia Sophia. With a tram stop in just 200m distance one is easily in other parts of the city.

Every one at the hotel did their best for us to have a nice visit in Istanbul. Delicious food at the hotel restaurant. The location of the hotel was perfect for someone who has never been to Istanbul before.
reviews.title: Very helpfull staff and good location

reviews.text: Stayed there for the Istanbul marathon, great central location and perfect for the finish of the race. Did the 15k and will hopefully use it again next year for the marathon. Plus the staff were really friendly.
reviews.title: Perfect place to stay for the marathon.

reviews.text: We stayed there last year for 2 nights, it is a very good Hotel and fantastically positioned for those who have never been to Istanbul before. It is very well positioned for all the sights that one must go and see, within easy walking distance to all of them including the Grand Bazaar. The Hotel has a fabulous little restaurant where they serve the breakfast and other meals. I would definitely recommend this Hotel and would stay there again !!
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel in great location

reviews.text: While visiting Turkey we stayed there twice on both our stops in Istanbul, it is a wonderful hotel with a great restaurant with a beautiful patio to hangout. It is conveniently located in the middle of the action and major tourist attractions, it is also a short drive to the airport. The staff is extremely friendly and goes out of their way to make their guest feel at home.
reviews.title: Great hotel, amazing place to hangout

reviews.text: My wife, son-in-law, grandson and I stayed in the Faros Hotel for 2 separate nights on a recent trip to Turkey. We can't praise it too highly. It is central, being within a short walk of Ayia Sofia, the Blue Mosque and other historic attractions. The rooms are clean, the restaurant is first-class and the staff are efficient and friendly. We will always try to stay there on future visits to Istanbul
reviews.title: lovely hotel and restaurant

reviews.text: A friend highly recommended the hotel and we are so glad we followed her advice.The location is so perfect...it is near the Blue Mosque,Hagia Sophia,the Grand Bazaar.So many cafes,restaurants...spoilt for choices!The staff .....splendid and excellant service.They go all out to make your stay in Istanbul memorable and with the least inconvenience.Make sure you ask for the room with view of the street.
reviews.title: excellant

reviews.text: The hotel is in perfect location, only 2 minutes walk to Aiya Sofia, grand bazar and tram station. Standard room 105 is small but clean and has queen sized bed.. Personnel were friendly and willing to help. Breakfast need to be improved, very boring and not suitable for Asian visitor. Overall, I recommend this hotel and want definitely to go back here again.
reviews.title: A good address in Istanbul

reviews.text: This was my third time in Istanbul, I allways love this city but was allways very disapponted about the Hotels. But Faros Hotel made everything change. for the price and the location it is amazing. It is very cute, clean and the staff was out of this world. Suat, Ali, Lokman and the new girl at the front desk are just incredibly honest and nice people. We usually stay in American Style Hotels, but I will from now on stay here. The food is very good too.
reviews.title: Very Nice!

reviews.text: Stayed here three nights with my family. A very friendly and helpful little hotel. Clean and comfortable. Nice rooms, good location. The staff is quite good in English, good WiFi, nice restaurant. Some noice from the street but not to much.
reviews.title: very good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel has everything you could wish for from a hotel . The staff are very accommodating. Suat the manager can't help you enough and ugur the waiter is very friendly and polite.
reviews.title: Superb hotel

reviews.text: The rooms are stunning and clean with tea and coffee making facilities. The breakfast is gorgeous and the restaurant food is amazing.
reviews.title: Faros Hotel Sultanahmet

reviews.text: This hotel has constant hot water even in the winter.
reviews.title: Great location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is situated in a central location close to the blue mosque and grand bazaar and only a tram ride away from taksim sq. the tram is directly outside the hotel.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed in many hotels in istanbul and this hotel is by far the best.
reviews.title: FAROS is an excellent option for any western traveler
